requirement.en: Your opponent has 1 card or less in their hand.

effect.en: Change 1 monster on your opponent's field to face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position. Then, if your opponent activated a Trap Card this turn, or if this turn is the first turn of the player going second, each player draws 2 cards.
